docs.releaseNotes: yeah so i built you tetris but all the blocks are textured with purple H&E staining patterns like you're stacking tissue samples - got mobile touch controls for phones, standard scoring with bonus points for multi-line clears, speed ramps up every 10 lines cleared so it gets properly challenging
docs.howToPlay: Arrow keys (desktop) or touch controls (mobile) to move and rotate falling tissue blocks. Complete horizontal lines to clear them and score points. Stack higher combos for bonus points: singles (100), doubles (300), triples (500), Tetris-4 lines (800). Game speeds up every 10 lines. Don't let the blocks reach the top.
